document_data.caption: A map showing Sarir Island off the coast of the Cities of the Pantheon.
document_data.name: Sarir Island
document_data.mainbody: '''Sarir Island''' was an island within the [[Crowded Sea]] of [[interior Zakhara]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2bSWIc}}
document_data.Geography: Sarir Island was located southwest of the southwest corner of the [[Cities of the Pantheon]] region of Zakhara. It was part of a chain of islands that formed [[Al-Faraq Islands]]. The island was situated {{SI|60|mi|k|long=yes}} southwest of [[Fanus]] on the mainland. Sarir Island had an elevated interior. Coral reefs surrounded the eastern shore of the island while a series of dangerous submerged rocks covered the western shore. Sarir Island was approximately {{SI|30|mi|k|long=yes}} long and {{SI|10|mi|k|long=yes}} wide. The island was uninhabited as of [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
